description: The drama series draws ire for a gruesome and fictitious human chess scene at Auschwitz.
title: Hunters: Jewish groups criticise Holocaust portrayal in Amazon show
title_page: Hunters: Jewish groups criticise Holocaust portrayal in Amazon show - BBC News
maintext: "When you decide to make a profit on selling vicious antisemitic Nazi propaganda published without any critical comment or context, you need to remember that those words led not only to the #Holocaust but also many other hate crimes," it said.
